```python
result = agent.run(task="Complex task")

for i, step in enumerate(result.steps):
    print(f"\n=== Step {i + 1} ===")
    print(f"Action: {step.get('action')}")
    print(f"Success: {step.get('success')}")
    print(f"Page URL: {step.get('url')}")
    print(f"Message: {step.get('message')}")
```
